question: Which country is set to create a public platform to track polluters?
explanation:
China has recently announced that it will set up a new information platform to track emissions of polluting enterprises.
It will also help the authorities to penalise those who break the rules or try to evade the supervisory guidelines. Around 2 million companies in China are obliged to obtain permits, for emitting pollutants like sulphur dioxide or wastewater.
